game_description: It is an multi map online Party game. This demo include 4 maps. apple pie (co-op map, support up to 12 players go through the level together, help each other) ghost shoot ( pvp mode, “hide" and "shoot") fire survive (pvp mode, try to survive) banana pie(co-op map, with fire,ice and more elements in the level
review_1: Just a little buggy and some toxic people but this game is so good I love it it’s so funny also people Who put one star is a poop head
review_5: Make more maps please make more stuff just make more stuff
